name: Pocket Llama Clicker
description:
You are bored? You've come to the right place!

Click, get llamas, upgrade and get achievements! Introducing the Pocket Llama Cliker!

There are 28 different llamas in the game. You can get each of them from chests that you can buy in the store.
Each llama has a rarity: Common, Rare, Epic, Legendary, Mythical, or Exclusive.
The higher rarity of the selected llama, the more coins you get per click.

Have fun!
